2fa_dialog_note_text: Yog tias koj muaj teeb meem siv QR code, xaiv phau ntawv nkag ntawm koj lub app, thiab sau koj lub npe siv thiab tus lej:

2fa_extra_security: Ntxiv ib txheej ntxiv ntawm kev ruaj ntseg rau koj tus account
2fa_enabled_desc: Koj tus account muaj kev tiv thaiv los ntawm kev siv ob-factor authentication. Koj yuav tsum sau tus lej 4-lej thaum koj nkag mus rau hauv los ntawm cov khoom siv tshiab.
2fa_disabled_desc: Qhib kev lees paub ob yam kom ntxiv ib txheej kev ruaj ntseg rau koj tus account. Koj yuav tsum sau tus lej 4-tus lej uas yuav tsum tau siv sijhawm thaum koj nkag mus.
2fa_account_protected: Koj tus lej nyiaj raug tiv thaiv nrog 2FA
2fa_enable_to_secure: Qhib 2FA kom ruaj ntseg koj tus account
failed_to_check_2fa_status: Ua tsis tiav los xyuas 2FA xwm txheej
2fa_initial_desc: Tshawb xyuas koj qhov kev lees paub ob qho xwm txheej kom pom tias koj tus as khauj muaj kev tiv thaiv nrog txheej txheej ntxiv ntawm kev ruaj ntseg.
check_2fa_status_description: Tshawb xyuas koj li 2FA xwm txheej kom pom tias koj tus lej raug tiv thaiv
disable_2fa_warning_message: Disabling ob-factor authentication yuav ua rau koj tus account tsis muaj kev ruaj ntseg. Koj puas paub tias koj xav mus ntxiv?
disable_2fa_security_note: Koj tus lej nyiaj yuav raug tiv thaiv los ntawm koj tus password nkaus xwb.
2fa_disabled_successfully: 2FA tau ua tiav tiav rau koj tus account.
_2fa_login_verification_section: 2FA ID nkag mus pov thawj seem
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Sau tus lej 4-tus lej los ntawm koj lub authenticator app kom ua tiav koj qhov kev nkag mus.
2fa_login_info: Qhib koj lub authenticator app kom tau tus lej.
2fa_code_must_be_6_digits: 2FA code yuav tsum yog 6 tus lej
welcome_description:
Ua kom tiav qhov kev qhia luv luv no rau qhov tshwj xeeb txais tos nyeem ntxiv lawm.

Nws yuav siv sij hawm ib feeb xwb!
free_spins_description:
Txhua hnub lossis lub limtiam koj nkag mus, koj tus lej yuav raug muab tsub txhua hnub 'Free Spins' thiab txhua lub limtiam 'Mystery Boxes'.

Tus lej koj tau txais nyob ntawm koj tus lej account.
daily_streak_description:
Txhua hnub koj nkag mus thiab khwv tau tus lej tsawg kawg ntawm Npib, koj tuaj yeem thov koj qhov kev sib tw txhua hnub.

Ntau hnub sib law liag koj thov koj qhov kev sib tw, qhov khoom plig loj dua!

Cov qib nyiaj siab dua kuj tau txais khoom plig loj dua.
ptc_ads_description:
Saib PTC Ads kom ceev, luv luv tshaj tawm los txhawb koj cov nyiaj npib txhua hnub.

Kev tshaj tawm yuav qhib rau hauv tab tshiab, yog li xyuas kom nws qhib kom txog thaum lub sijhawm ua tiav!
missions_description:
Koj yuav pom ntau pua txoj haujlwm thiab quests kom ua tiav hauv ntu 'Lub Hom Phiaj' ntawm lub vev xaib.

Ua kom tiav txoj haujlwm thiab quests yog txoj hauv kev zoo kom tau txais nyiaj npib ntxiv.

Txheeb xyuas Nplooj → 'Bonus Missions' kom paub meej.
offers_description:
Ua kom tiav cov kev pabcuam yog ib txoj hauv kev zoo tshaj plaws kom khwv tau npib ntawm GigaFaucet.

Kev muab tuaj yeem pom hauv ntu 'Earn' ntawm lub vev xaib.

Muaj ntau ntau hom kev muab muaj. Nco ntsoov xyuas lawv rau cov uas ua haujlwm zoo tshaj rau koj.
xp_description:
Txhua zaus koj ua tiav qhov kev thov, ua si qhov sib npaug, lossis saib cov yeeb yaj kiab, thiab lwm yam, koj yuav tau txais XP (Kev Paub Cov Ntsiab Lus).

Kev khwv nyiaj XP yuav nce koj tus as khauj, qhib ntau yam nta thiab khoom plig loj dua.

Koj tuaj yeem pom koj tus account theem ntawm koj qhov profile lossis nplooj ntawv nyiaj tshwj xeeb.
withdraw_description:
Koj tuaj yeem thim koj cov npib thaum koj ntaus yam tsawg kawg ntawm 30,000 Npib.

Txhawm rau rho tawm, mus rau Account → 'Cash Out' thiab xaiv koj txoj kev rho tawm uas koj nyiam.

Ua raws li cov lus qhia kom ua tiav koj qhov kev rho tawm.
all_set_description:
Tam sim no koj npaj txhij pib khwv tau npib ntawm GigaFaucet!

Nco ntsoov xyuas rov qab txhua hnub rau koj cov nyiaj npib thiab cov thawv tsis meej, thiab ua tiav cov kev tshaj tawm thiab txoj haujlwm kom ua kom koj cov nyiaj tau los ntau tshaj plaws.

Hmoov zoo thiab muaj kev lom zem!

referral_get_started_desc: Tsuas xa cov neeg siv mus rau GigaFaucet siv koj li kev xa mus txuas. Lawv yuav cia li taug qab thiab ntaus nqi rau koj yog tias lawv sau npe txhua lub sijhawm hauv 30 hnub.
referral_point_1: Koj yuav tau txais 25% ntawm txhua qhov kev xa mus rau faucet thov FOR LIFE.
referral_point_2: Koj tseem yuav tau txais 10% ntawm ib qho ntawm koj qhov kev xa mus muab cov nyiaj tau los ntawm phab ntsa.
referral_point_3: Tsis muaj kev txwv rau tus naj npawb ntawm cov neeg xa mus xa tuaj.
referral_point_4: Kev xa mus rau tib lub cuab yeej lossis hauv tib tsev neeg tsis raug tso cai thiab yuav tsis suav tias yog kev xa mus.
referral_warning: TSEEM CEEB: Cov ntawv xa mus tsis raug, cuav lossis sib npaug yuav tsis raug suav. Koj tus as khauj yuav raug txiav tawm thiab tag nrho cov npib raug rho tawm yog tias koj pom tias xa cov xa mus tsis raug.

name_too_long: Lub npe yuav tsum tsis pub tshaj 50 cim

password_too_short: Tus password yuav tsum muaj tsawg kawg yog 8 tus cim

failed_to_change_password: Hloov password tsis tau. Thov rov sim dua.
twofa_description: Cov apps lees paub ob yam ntxiv ib txheej kev ruaj ntseg ntxiv rau koj tus account. Thaum koj nkag mus rau hauv lub cuab yeej tshiab, koj yuav tsum sau tus lej 4-tus lej uas muaj lub sijhawm cuam tshuam.
security_pin_description: Koj yuav tsum nkag mus rau 4 tus lej PIN code thaum lees paub cov haujlwm tseem ceeb.
repeat_4_digit_pin: Rov ua dua 4 tus lej PIN Code
enter_security_pin: Sau tus pin kev ruaj ntseg
security_pin_empty_error: Yuav tsum muaj tus PIN ruaj ntseg
security_pin_length_error: PIN yuav tsum yog 4 tus lej
security_pin_must_be_numeric: PIN yuav tsum muaj cov lej xwb
security_pin_enabled_successfully: Kev ruaj ntseg PIN tau ua tiav
failed_to_enable_security_pin: Ua tsis tau tejyam pab tus PIN kev ruaj ntseg. Thov rov sim dua.
enable_security_pin_note: Siv koj tus lej PIN kev ruaj ntseg 4 tus lej kom paub meej tias qhov tseem ceeb ntawm tus account.
notifications_description: Qhib cov ntawv ceeb toom kom tau txais kev ceeb toom txog cov teeb meem tseem ceeb
show_stats_description: Thaum enabled, koj tus account stats tau pom ntawm koj qhov profile. Enabled los ntawm lub neej ntawd.
anonymous_in_contests: Tsis qhia npe hauv {0}kev sib tw
anonymous_contests_description: Thaum qhib, koj tus account yuav tshwm sim tsis qhia npe hauv kev sib tw qeb duas. Tawm los ntawm lub neej ntawd.
no_coin_earn_history: Tsis muaj npib khwv tau keeb kwm tseem.
delete_account_description: Rho tawm koj tus account yog qhov ruaj khov. Koj qhov khoom plig, npib thiab xa mus yuav ploj mus ib txhis.
country_not_changed_error: Lub teb chaws xaiv yog tib yam li koj lub tebchaws tam sim no
delete_confirmation_description: Koj tau txais tus lej 6-tus lej los lees paub koj tus account raug rho tawm.
enter_delete_confirmation_code: Sau tus lej lees paub 4-tus lej
code_will_expire_in: Code yuav tas sijhawm hauv {0} feeb
interest_notification_description: Khaws yam tsawg kawg yog {0} npib kom khwv tau {1}% paj. Cov paj laum yog them txhua lub lim tiam. Tig nws rau hauv koj qhov chaw.
balances_update_info: Cov nyiaj tshuav hloov tshiab txhua {0} feeb. Keeb kwm txwv rau {1} hnub.
enter_2fa_code_from_app: Sau koj tus lej 4-tus lej los ntawm lub authenticator app
code_must_be_exactly_6_digits: Tus lej yuav tsum yog 6 tus lej raws nraim
code_must_be_numbers_only: Cov lej yuav tsum muaj cov lej xwb
affiliate_program_description: Tau txais khoom plig tas mus li txog li {0}% rau kev caw cov neeg tshiab
